WorkPlace.Name: MEGA FLEX A/S
WorkPlace.Description: MEGA FLEX har i mere end 30 år leveret ydelser til nogle af Danmarks største bygge og industri virksomheder. Vi har oparbejdet en erfaring og ekspertise som vi konstant søger at forbedre. Vi udfører alle opgaver efter de høje normer i ISO 9001. Det betyder at kvaliteten af vore ydelser og arbejdsmiljøet for vore medarbejdere er garanteret.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a number of certified welders for huge projects in Denmark.

Do you want to work in Denmark, for a company with more than 30 years of experience in managing people, and offering jobs within the construction industry?

We offer good conditions according to Danish labor laws, and we work closely toghether with the Danish unions. We take care of accommodation, transport to and from work in Denmark, and we help you understanding the Danish rules and laws.

We expect you to do a good job for our clients, meet on time, and act in a proffessional and safe way, at all times.

For this particular job we require you to possess a valid welder certificate corresponding with EN ISO 9606-1:2017.

You will be asked to do and on-site  welder test when you are here, and this test will confirm your skills before you start working on these critical components.

Salary level is 20-22 EUR per hour, before TAX and other expenses.

If you are interested in this job, please use the contact information below.

We are looking for a number of certified welders for huge projects in Denmark.

Do you want to work in Denmark, for a company with more than 30 years of experience in managing people, and offering jobs within the construction industry?

We offer good conditions according to Danish labor laws, and we work closely toghether with the Danish unions. We take care of accommodation, transport to and from work in Denmark, and we help you understanding the Danish rules and laws.

We expect you to do a good job for our clients, meet on time, and act in a proffessional and safe way, at all times.

For this particular job we require you to possess a valid welder certificate corresponding with EN ISO 9606-1:2017.

You will be asked to do and on-site  welder test when you are here, and this test will confirm your skills before you start working on these critical components.

Salary level is 20-22 EUR per hour, before TAX and other expenses.

If you are interested in this job, please use the contact information below.
